XP_BUFFER_SIZE = 10000

LEARNING_RATE = 0.01
SYNC_NETS_FRAMES = 100
EPSILON_MAX = 1.0
EPSILON_MIN = 0.01
EPSILON_FINAL_FRAME_DECAY = 300000
GAMMA = 0.99
Weight_init = self.weights[filter,:,:,:] = np.random.normal(loc=0, 
                            scale=np.sqrt(1. / (self.in_channels * self.kernel_size * self.kernel_size)), 
                            size=(self.in_channels, self.kernel_size, self.kernel_size))
                self.weights = 0.01 * np.random.rand(num_inputs, num_outputs)
